title: Hour 2 - Bring Back Afternoon Baseball, Shohei vs. Babe
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Bring Back Afternoon Baseball, Shohei vs. Babe
description:
Dan examines the idea of having a nationally televised afternoon baseball game on a daily basis, and says the only comparison for Shohei Ohtani's accomplishments and records is Babe Ruth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
